org.anarres.gradle.plugin.stdproject

Class StdModuleExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      • org.anarres.gradle.plugin.stdproject.StdModuleExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    groovy.lang.GroovyObject

    public class StdModuleExtension
extends groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
    The standard module plugin extension. This allows configuring the standard module plugin using a stdmodule { } block.
